javaFlacEncoder

Class FLACStreamOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaFlacEncoder.FLACStreamOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, FLACOutputStream

    public class FLACStreamOutputStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements FLACOutputStream, java.io.Closeable
    This class provides basic OutputStream support for writing from a FLACEncoder.
    Author:
    Preston Lacey

        public long seek(long pos)

        Specified by:
